dc:title: Explains CW Stand on Use of Force
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Clarifies the Catholic Worker position regarding the war in Spain, opposing violence as a solution. Urges prayer for peace, love instead of violence, and preparation for martyrdom.
